titles.title: Taidan Sono Go: Nagahama Hiroshi [Kantoku] x Hama Yuuki [Satsuei Kantoku] - Tanaka Tadashi [Satsuei Kantoku Hosa] - Ooyama Yoshihisa [Technical Advisor]
